labels.exportEmbedScene_details: Sɨn deeta ŋwɨji njɨm sɨn sɨlɔɔndɨ PNG/SVG file de, na njɨm sɨn kɔpi deema ŋwɨji i wuwo.
labels.name: Jina

library.hint_emptyLibrary: Mbaɨ mɛndɨs na njɨm sɨm di, na kɔntɛna libɛri na publik pʉbiri, beŋa.
library.hint_emptyPrivateLibrary: Mbaɨ mɛndɨs na njɨm sɨm di.

alerts.clearReset: Di kɔvɔsi zɨŋga. Mbuɔ i sɨrɛ?
alerts.couldNotCreateShareableLinkTooBig: Tɨnda krijet shareable link: sɨn zɨŋga.
alerts.uploadedSecurly: Di ɔplɔdi zɨŋga di sekyaŋdɨ kɔ kɔlɔɔ-kɔlɔɔ, diŋkɔ disi Excalidraw sevɨ na tɔk saʉvd party maŋgɔ.
alerts.loadSceneOverridePrompt: Loodi external draŋi zɨŋga zɨŋga di njɨm sɨn. Mbuɔ i sɨrɛ?
alerts.collabStopOverridePrompt:
Stopi di sɛsyɔn zɨŋga zaŋkɛ oloodi, diŋkɔ na locally sɔti draŋi. Mbuɔ i sɨrɛ?

(Si ɨ wantɨ kiip i locally draŋi, bɛnli klosi di brauzatap sɨɔna.)
alerts.confirmAddLibrary: Zaŋkɛ i mɛndɨs {{numShapes}} mɛndɨs na libɛri. Mbuɔ i sɨrɛ?
alerts.imageDoesNotContainScene: Di mɛndɨs zɨŋga di ŋwiŋga zaŋkɛɛnjɨn sɨn. ɨ sɨrɛ ɨ nyɨmbi scene embedding diŋkɔ export?
alerts.cannotRestoreFromImage: Scene tɨnda deŋdɨŋkɔ from di mɛndɨs file zɨŋga
alerts.invalidSceneUrl: Tɨnda import scene from di bɔna URL. ɨ sɨrɛ bɔna, o beŋdɨŋɔ sɨdɨ Excalidraw JSON data.
alerts.resetLibrary: Di kɔli libɛri zɨŋga. Mbuɔ i sɨrɛ?
alerts.invalidEncryptionKey: Diŋkɔdis key mɔst bi ɔf 22 charaktas. Laiv kɔlabɔreysɨn di sekyaŋdɨ.
alerts.collabOfflineWarning:
No intanɛt konekshɨn aveilabɔ. 
Yuor ʧeŋjɛz wɨl not bi sevd!

errors.imageInsertError: Tɨnda inseɛt mɛndɨs. Traɔi anoda taim...
errors.fileTooBig: File too big. Maksimam alaud saiz bi {{maxSize}}.
errors.svgImageInsertError: Tɨnda inseɛt SVG mɛndɨs. Di SVG markup lʊks invalid.
errors.cannotResolveCollabServer: Tɨnda kɔnek di kɔlab sɛvɛr. Pliz riloɔd di pej ɨn traɔi anoda taim.
errors.collabSaveFailed: Tɨnda sev to di backend database. If prɔblɛm persist, yu shɔd sev yuor file locally fo ɨnsɨr yu no los yuor wɛk.
errors.collabSaveFailed_sizeExceeded: Tɨnda sev to di backend database, di kɔvɔsi sɨms to bi too big. Yu shɔd sev di file locally fo ɨnsɨr yu no los yuor wɛk.

brave_measure_text_error.start: Lʊks laik yu de yuus Brave brauzatapi wɨt di
brave_measure_text_error.break: Dis kud riʧɔlt in brekin di
brave_measure_text_error.strongly_recommend: Wi strɔŋgli rikɔmɛnd disɛyblin dis sɛtɪŋ. Yu kan fala
brave_measure_text_error.disable_setting: If disɛyblin dis sɛtɪŋ no fiks di disple of text elɛmɛnts, pliz oplɛn an
brave_measure_text_error.write: ɔn yuor GitHub, o rit ʌs ɔn

toolBar.lock: Kip sɛlɛkted tul aktiv afta draŋi
toolBar.link: Ad/ ʌpdeyt linki fo a sɛlɛkted shep

hints.canvasPanning: Ŋga ŋgam, yiŋge ntʉɔɔŋko maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn neyiŋge spacebar tɛkɛmbɔ nɔsɔ, ɔ nyɛlɛ ntsyɔbɔ
hints.linearElement: Bɔŋɔ ntɔmbɔ nɔsɔ, yiŋge nɔlɛ maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn
hints.freeDraw: Yiŋge nɔlɛ neyiŋge nɔmbɔ, yiŋge nlɛɛ a yiŋge kɛyɛmɔ
hints.text: Nkɛ wuɛ: yiŋge dɔlɔ-ntɔmbɔ mɔ nyɛlɛ fɨfɨdɛ maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn
hints.text_selected: Nyɛlɛ fɨfɨdɛ neyiŋge yiŋge ENTER bɔ ɔfɛndɨ tɛkst
hints.text_editing: Nyɛlɛ Escape bɔ yiŋge CtrlOrCmd+ENTER bɔ mɔ ntɔmbɔ fɨfɨdɛ
hints.linearElementMulti: Yiŋge fɨfɨdɛ nyɛlɛ yiŋge Escape bɔ yiŋge Enter bɔ mɔ ntɔmbɔ
hints.lockAngle: Yiŋge bɔ ɔlɔfɔ neyiŋge ntsyɔbɔ SHIFT
hints.resize:
Yiŋge bɔ ɔlɔfɔ neyiŋge ntsyɔbɔ SHIFT maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn,
yiŋge ALT maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn wɔ ntɔmbɔ
hints.resizeImage:
Yiŋge bɔ ɔlɔfɔ neyiŋge ntsyɔbɔ SHIFT maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn,
yiŋge ALT maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn wɔ ntɔmbɔ
hints.rotate: Yiŋge bɔ ɔlɔfɔ neyiŋge ntsyɔbɔ SHIFT maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn
hints.lineEditor_info: Yiŋge CtrlOrCmd maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn neyiŋge Double-click bɔ yiŋge CtrlOrCmd + Enter bɔ mɔ ntɔmbɔ
hints.lineEditor_pointSelected:
Yiŋge Delete bɔ wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn,
CtrlOrCmd+D bɔ mɔ tɛmɛ, o wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn
hints.lineEditor_nothingSelected:
Yiŋge ntɔmbɔ bɔ wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn (yiŋge SHIFT bɔ wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn nɔmbɔ),
ɔ yiŋge Alt bɔ yiŋge click bɔ mɔ tɛmɛ maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn
hints.placeImage: Yiŋge nɔmbɔ mɔ nyɛlɛ fɨfɨdɛ, yiŋge yiŋge click bɔ yiŋge drag bɔ mɔ ntɔmbɔ
hints.publishLibrary: Nsu nɨ mɛri ŋgam ɔ nɨsɔ
hints.deepBoxSelect: Kʉla CtrlOrCmd bɔ wuul ŋgam, ɔ nyɛlɛ kɛlɔfɔ ndag
hints.eraserRevert: Kʉla Alt bɔ wuul ŋgam a nyɛlɛ maŋkɔlɔn
hints.firefox_clipboard_write: Nsɨ o boŋo aŋgeŋi fɨŋga byɔlɔ laɨkli nɨ ntebɨlɛ ntsi di "dom.events.asyncClipboard.clipboardItem" flaeg tɔ "true". Laikɛl ntsi di flaeg di brauzatapi in Firefox, yiŋge laikɛl "about:config" pej.

canvasError.canvasTooBigTip: Nkɛ wuɛ: yiŋge ntsyɔbɔ nɨ nɔlɛ mɨba kɛkɛlɔ ɨso.

errorSplash.openIssueMessage_pre: Wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn na yiŋge ti bɔ o nkɛntɛ naɨkɔndɔnŋe. Ɔ yiŋge mɨba yiŋge
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_post: Yiŋge yiŋge mɨba ntsi di yiŋge GitHub issue pej.

roomDialog.desc_intro: Ŋga ŋgam, yiŋge fɨyɨndi mɔ ŋga ɨkɛndi bɔ ŋga ɨsɔ.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Don't worry, the session uses end-to-end encryption, so whatever you draw will stay private. Not even our server will be able to see what you come up with.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Yiŋge yiŋge sɨsɨn ŋga mɔ nɨdi ɨsɔ.
roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Stop fɨyɨndi na yiŋge yiŋge deyɔn nɨsɔ, kɛŋge yiŋge yiŋge mɨlɨbɨlɨ wɨnɔdɨ. Yiŋge yiŋge ti naɨkɔndɔn ɔ ɨsɔ aŋge mɨsɨn, ɨso. Na nkɛndi mɨba ɔ ɨsɔŋgo, ɔ yiŋge mɔ ŋga ɨsɔ mɔti ɔ mɨlɨbɨlɨ wɨnɔdɨ.
roomDialog.shareTitle: Fɨyɨndi bɔ mɔ sɨsɨn ŋga ŋgam Excalidraw

exportDialog.disk_details: Export na ŋgam nɨ fɨlɨ di ɨti yiŋge lɔkɔp na ŋgam bɔ wuul maŋkɔlɔŋkɔn.
exportDialog.link_details: Export ŋga sɨsɨn na fɨlɨ di.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_description: Nsɔŋɔ na ŋgam na Excalidraw+ workspace di.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_exportError: Ŋga yiŋge ŋgam kɛkɛkɔlɔ ɨso Excalidraw+ tɛnŋgo...

helpDialog.deepBoxSelect: Kʉla kɛlɔfɔ ndag, ɔ nyɛlɛ kɛlɔfɔ ndag
helpDialog.title: Help

publishDialog.title: Publish library

placeholder.libraryDesc: Description of your library to help people understand its usage
placeholder.githubHandle: GitHub handle (optional), so you can edit the library once submitted for review
placeholder.twitterHandle: Twitter username (optional), so we know who to credit when promoting over Twitter
placeholder.website: Link to your personal website or elsewhere (optional)

noteDescription.pre: Submit your library to be included in the
noteDescription.post: for other people to use in their drawings.

noteGuidelines.pre: The library needs to be manually approved first. Please read the
noteGuidelines.post: before submitting. You will need a GitHub account to communicate and make changes if requested, but it is not strictly required.

noteLicense.pre: By submitting, you agree the library will be published under the
noteLicense.post: which in short means anyone can use them without restrictions.

publishDialog.noteItems: Each library item must have its own name so it's filterable. The following library items will be included:
publishDialog.atleastOneLibItem: Please select at least one library item to get started
publishDialog.republishWarning: Note: some of the selected items are marked as already published/submitted. You should only resubmit items when updating an existing library or submission.

publishSuccessDialog.title: Library submitted
publishSuccessDialog.content: Thank you {{authorName}}. Your library has been submitted for review. You can track the status

encrypted.tooltip: Your drawings are end-to-end encrypted so Excalidraw's servers will never see them.
encrypted.link: Blog post on end-to-end encryption in Excalidraw

toast.pasteAsSingleElement:
Use {{shortcut}} to paste as a single element,
or paste into an existing text editor

app.center_heading: All your data is saved locally in your browser.
app.center_heading_plus: Did you want to go to the Excalidraw+ instead?
